subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: A state court justice in Manhattan ordered the Yankees on Wednesday to demonstrate why the team should not have to produce a catalog of documents, for his inspection, about the new Yankee Stadium’s financing, ticket prices and job creation.
snippet: A state court justice in Manhattan ordered the Yankees on Wednesday to demonstrate why the team should not have to produce a catalog of documents, for his inspection, about the new Yankee Stadium’s financing, ticket prices and job creation.
